94 class CIccCurveSegment
95 {
96 public:
97  virtual ~CIccCurveSegment() {}
98 
99  static CIccCurveSegment* Create(icCurveSegSignature sig, icFloatNumber start, icFloatNumber end);
100  virtual CIccCurveSegment* NewCopy() const = 0;
101 
102  virtual icCurveSegSignature GetType() const = 0;
103  virtual const icChar *GetClassName() const = 0;
104 
105  virtual void Describe(std::string &sDescription)=0;
106 
107  virtual bool Read(icUInt32Number size, CIccIO *pIO)=0;
108  virtual bool Write(CIccIO *pIO)=0;
109 
110  virtual bool Begin(CIccCurveSegment *pPrevSeg) = 0;
111  virtual icFloatNumber Apply(icFloatNumber v) const =0;
112 
113  virtual icValidateStatus Validate(icTagSignature sig, std::string &sReport, const CIccTagMultiProcessElement* pMPE=NULL) const = 0;
114 
115  icFloatNumber StartPoint() { return m_startPoint; }
116  icFloatNumber EndPoint() { return m_endPoint;}
117 
118 protected:
119  icFloatNumber m_startPoint;
120  icFloatNumber m_endPoint;
121  icUInt32Number m_nReserved;
122 };

132 class CIccFormulaCurveSegment : public CIccCurveSegment
133 {
134 public:
135  CIccFormulaCurveSegment(icFloatNumber start, icFloatNumber end);
136  CIccFormulaCurveSegment(const CIccFormulaCurveSegment &seg);
137  CIccFormulaCurveSegment &operator=(const CIccFormulaCurveSegment &seg);
138  virtual CIccCurveSegment *NewCopy() const { return new CIccFormulaCurveSegment(*this);}
139  virtual ~CIccFormulaCurveSegment();
140 
141  virtual icCurveSegSignature GetType() const { return icSigFormulaCurveSeg; }
142  virtual const icChar *GetClassName() const { return "CIccFormulaCurveSegment"; }
143 
144  virtual void Describe(std::string &sDescription);
145 
146  void SetFunction(icUInt16Number functionType, icUInt8Number num_parameters, icFloatNumber *parameters);
147 
148  virtual bool Read(icUInt32Number size, CIccIO *pIO);
149  virtual bool Write(CIccIO *pIO);
150 
151  virtual bool Begin(CIccCurveSegment *pPrevSeg);
152  virtual icFloatNumber Apply(icFloatNumber v) const;
153  virtual icValidateStatus Validate(icTagSignature sig, std::string &sReport, const CIccTagMultiProcessElement* pMPE=NULL) const;
154 
155 protected:
156  icUInt16Number m_nReserved2;
157  icUInt8Number m_nParameters;
158  icUInt16Number m_nFunctionType;
159  icFloatNumber *m_params;
160 };

170 class CIccSampledCurveSegment : public CIccCurveSegment
171 {
172 public:
173  CIccSampledCurveSegment(icFloatNumber start, icFloatNumber end);
174  CIccSampledCurveSegment(const CIccSampledCurveSegment &ITPC);
175  CIccSampledCurveSegment &operator=(const CIccSampledCurveSegment &ParamCurveTag);
176  virtual CIccCurveSegment *NewCopy() const { return new CIccSampledCurveSegment(*this);}
177  virtual ~CIccSampledCurveSegment();
178 
179  virtual icCurveSegSignature GetType() const { return icSigSampledCurveSeg; }
180  virtual const icChar *GetClassName() const { return "CIccSampledCurveSegment"; }
181 
182  virtual bool SetSize(icUInt32Number nSize, bool bZeroAlloc=true); //nSize must be >= 2
183  virtual icUInt32Number GetSize() { return m_nCount; }
184 
185  virtual icFloatNumber *GetSamples() { return m_pSamples; }
186 
187  virtual void Describe(std::string &sDescription);
188 
189  virtual bool Read(icUInt32Number size, CIccIO *pIO);
190  virtual bool Write(CIccIO *pIO);
191 
192  virtual bool Begin(CIccCurveSegment *pPrevSeg);
193  virtual icFloatNumber Apply(icFloatNumber v) const;
194  virtual icValidateStatus Validate(icTagSignature sig, std::string &sReport, const CIccTagMultiProcessElement* pMPE=NULL) const ;
195 
196 protected:
197  icUInt32Number m_nCount; //number of samples used for interpolation
198  icFloatNumber *m_pSamples; //interpolation values - Note m_pSamples[0] is initialized from previous segment in Begin()
199 
200  icFloatNumber m_range;
201  icFloatNumber m_last;
202 };

251  virtual ~CIccSegmentedCurve();
252 
253  virtual icCurveElemSignature GetType() const { return icSigSementedCurve; }
254  virtual const icChar *GetClassName() const { return "CIccSegmentedCurve"; }
255 
256  virtual void Describe(std::string &sDescription);
257 
258  virtual bool Read(icUInt32Number size, CIccIO *pIO);
259  virtual bool Write(CIccIO *pIO);
260 
261  void Reset();
262  bool Insert(CIccCurveSegment *pCurveSegment);
263 
264  virtual bool Begin();
265  virtual icFloatNumber Apply(icFloatNumber v) const;
266  virtual icValidateStatus Validate(icTagSignature sig, std::string &sReport, const CIccTagMultiProcessElement* pMPE=NULL) const;
267 
268 protected:

270  icUInt32Number m_nReserved1;

272 };

284 {

290  virtual ~CIccMpeCurveSet();
291 
292  void SetSize(int nNewSize);
293 
294  bool SetCurve(int nIndex, icCurveSetCurvePtr newCurve);
295 
296  virtual icElemTypeSignature GetType() const { return icSigCurveSetElemType; }
297  virtual const icChar *GetClassName() const { return "CIccMpeCurveSet"; }
298 
299  virtual void Describe(std::string &sDescription);
300 
301  virtual bool Read(icUInt32Number size, CIccIO *pIO);
302  virtual bool Write(CIccIO *pIO);
303 
304  virtual bool Begin(icElemInterp nInterp, CIccTagMultiProcessElement *pMPE);
305  virtual void Apply(CIccApplyMpe *pApply, icFloatNumber *dstPixel, const icFloatNumber *srcPixel) const;
306 
307  virtual icValidateStatus Validate(icTagSignature sig, std::string &sReport, const CIccTagMultiProcessElement* pMPE=NULL) const;
308 
309 protected:

311 
312  icPositionNumber *m_position;
313 };

331 class CIccMpeMatrix : public CIccMultiProcessElement
332 {
333 public:
334  CIccMpeMatrix();
335  CIccMpeMatrix(const CIccMpeMatrix &ITPC);
336  CIccMpeMatrix &operator=(const CIccMpeMatrix &ParamCurveTag);
337  virtual CIccMultiProcessElement *NewCopy() const { return new CIccMpeMatrix(*this);}
338  virtual ~CIccMpeMatrix();
339 
340  virtual icElemTypeSignature GetType() const { return icSigMatrixElemType; }
341  virtual const icChar *GetClassName() const { return "CIccMpeMatrix"; }
342 
343  virtual void Describe(std::string &sDescription);
344 
345  virtual bool Read(icUInt32Number size, CIccIO *pIO);
346  virtual bool Write(CIccIO *pIO);
347 
348  void SetSize(icUInt16Number nInputChannels, icUInt16Number nOutputChannels);
349 
350  icFloatNumber *GetMatrix() {return m_pMatrix;}
351  icFloatNumber *GetConstants() {return m_pConstants;}
352 
353  virtual bool Begin(icElemInterp nInterp, CIccTagMultiProcessElement *pMPE);
354  virtual void Apply(CIccApplyMpe *pApply, icFloatNumber *dstPixel, const icFloatNumber *srcPixel) const;
355 
356  virtual icValidateStatus Validate(icTagSignature sig, std::string &sReport, const CIccTagMultiProcessElement* pMPE=NULL) const;
357 
358 protected:
359  icFloatNumber *m_pMatrix;
360  icFloatNumber *m_pConstants;
361  icUInt32Number m_size;
362  icMatrixElemType m_type;
363 };

381 class CIccMpeCLUT : public CIccMultiProcessElement
382 {
383 public:

386  CIccMpeCLUT &operator=(const CIccMpeCLUT &clut);
387  virtual CIccMultiProcessElement *NewCopy() const { return new CIccMpeCLUT(*this);}
388  virtual ~CIccMpeCLUT();
389 
390  virtual icElemTypeSignature GetType() const { return icSigCLutElemType; }
391  virtual const icChar *GetClassName() const { return "CIccMpeCLUT"; }
392 
393  virtual void Describe(std::string &sDescription);
394 
395  virtual bool Read(icUInt32Number size, CIccIO *pIO);
396  virtual bool Write(CIccIO *pIO);
397 
398  virtual bool Begin(icElemInterp nInterp, CIccTagMultiProcessElement *pMPE);
399  virtual void Apply(CIccApplyMpe *pApply, icFloatNumber *dstPixel, const icFloatNumber *srcPixel) const;
400 
401  virtual icValidateStatus Validate(icTagSignature sig, std::string &sReport, const CIccTagMultiProcessElement* pMPE=NULL) const;
402 
403  CIccCLUT *GetCLUT() { return m_pCLUT; }
404  void SetCLUT(CIccCLUT *pCLUT);
405 
406 protected:
407  CIccCLUT *m_pCLUT;
408  icCLUTElemType m_interpType;
409 };
